title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM backend for chains, agents, retrieval, and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’); offers ChatGPT-like interface, RAG, admin panel, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative with inline suggestions and chat pane.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs and Markdown files.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports generate, chat, embed, pull, list, delete with fluent builders and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to Ollama’s REST API with strong typing and streaming support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread-based chats.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside the editor, generate code, refactor, and explain selections.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection, PVC model cache, and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM-powered tests.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama chat pane and commands to summarize notes, brainstorm, and rewrite text locally.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that listens for mentions and DMs, routes them to Ollama, and streams responses back as threaded replies.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot with group and private chat support, session memory, and inline query mode powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Utility to convert and push Hugging Face models into Ollama’s Modelfile format with one command.
